task.title: Associating virtual services resources with components
task.shortdesc: After creating components in the system model, you can navigate to a project in the Team space to associate the virtual service resources in the project repositories with the components in the system model.

ul.li: You must be a member of the project that contains the virtual services resources.

step.cmd: Click the project that contains the virtual services resources that you want to associate with components.
Click the component that you want to associate with virtual service resources.

info.p: The component details are displayed in the right pane.
The Virtualized Services page is displayed.
info.note: This Virtualized Services page lists all the virtual services resources that are available in the project as displayed in Virtualization Resources page .

step.cmd: Select one or more virtual services resources.

info.p: You can use the Search field to search for virtual services resources by using the virtual services resources name.

taskbody.result: You have associated components with the virtual services resources.
